00029 ## Class for generating velocity for Spiri
00030 class actioncontroller(object):
00031   ## Constructor
00032         def __init__(self,name):
00033 
00034                 self.state=Pose()
00035                 self._action_name=name
00036                 self.traj=trajectory_msgs.msg.MultiDOFJointTrajectory()
00037                 self._as=actionlib.ActionServer(self._action_name,ActionSpec=action_controller.msg.MultiDofFollowJointTrajectoryAction,goal_cb=self.goalcb,cancel_cb=self.cancelcb,auto_start=False)
00038                 self.pub=rospy.Publisher('cmd_vel',Twist,queue_size=1)
00039                 rospy.Subscriber('/ground_truth/state',Odometry,self.callback)
00040                 self.lastPosition=Transform()
00041                 self.vel=Twist()
00042                 self.flag=True
00043                 self.has_active_goal=False
00044                 self.active_goal=actionlib.ServerGoalHandle()
00045                 self._as.start()
00046                 self.state=Pose()
00047                 self.non_counter=0
00048                 self.agg_scale=0.0
00049         ## Callback function for the State topic.       This function will be called whenever a new message is published on a document
00050         # @param self Object pointer
00051         # @param data Contains data published on the topic
00052         def callback(self,data):
00053 
00054                 self.state=data.pose.pose
00055 
00056 
00057         def goalcb(self,gh):
00058                 if self.has_active_goal:
00059                         self.pub.publish(Twist())
00060                         active_goal.set_canceled()
00061                         self.has_active_goal=False
00062 
00063 
00064                 gh.set_accepted('goal accepted')
00065                 self.traj=gh.get_goal().trajectory
00066                 self.active_goal=gh
00067                 self.has_active_goal=True
00068                 #print 'I am in the goal callback'
00069                 #self.executetraj()
00070                 goal=self.compute_goal()
00071                 #self.publishvel_goal(goal)
00072                 self.pid_vel(goal)
00073         def cancelcb(self,gh):
00074                 if(self.active_goal==gh):
00075                         self.pub.publish(Twist())
00076                         self.active_goal.set_canceled()
00077                         self.has_active_goal=False
00078                         #print 'Cancelling the goal'
00079

00083         def executetraj(self):
00084                 traj_points=Transform()
00085                 for i in range(len(self.traj.points)):
00086                         traj_points=self.traj.points[i].transforms[0]
00087                         #print traj_points.transforms[0].translation
00088                         if(i!=0):
00089                                 self.flag=self.publishvel(traj_points,False)
00090                                 if i==len(self.traj.points)-1:
00091                                         if self.flag:
00092                                                 self.publishvel(traj_points,False)
00093                                         else:
00094                                                 self.publishvel(traj_points,True)
00095 
00096                         self.pub.publish(Twist())
00097                         if self.flag:
00098                                 self.lastPosition.translation=traj_points.translation
00099                                 self.lastPosition.rotation=traj_points.rotation
00100                 self.active_goal.set_succeeded()
00101                 #print ("goal has been reached")
00102                 self.has_active_goal=False
00103

00105         def publishvel_goal(self,goal):
00106                 counter=0
00107                 #for i in range(len(goal)):
00108                 while counter<len(goal):
00109                         #self.robot_state()
00110                         #print 'state is',self.state
00111                         #print 'your state should be',goal[counter-1]
00112                         #if self.state==goal[i-1]:
00113                         #       #print 'I have following the trajectory'
00114 
00115                         #flag=True
00116 
00117 
00118                         self.vel.linear.x=goal[counter].position.x-self.state.pose.position.x
00119                         #self.vel.linear.x=self.pid_vel(goal[counter])
00120                         self.vel.linear.y=goal[counter].position.y-self.state.pose.position.y
00121                         self.vel.linear.z=goal[counter].position.z-self.state.pose.position.z
00122                         #print "calculated the cmd vel topic"
00123 
00124                         # this loop is just for the agressive behaviour
00125                         if (abs(self.vel.linear.x)>=self.agg_scale or abs(self.vel.linear.y)>=self.agg_scale or abs(self.vel.linear.z)>=self.agg_scale):
00126                                 #print self.vel
00127                                 self.pub.publish(self.vel)
00128                                 #print"Published the commands"
00129                                 time.sleep(1.0)
00130                         #self.robot_state()
00131                         flag=self.checkgoal(goal[counter])
00132                         if flag:
00133                                 counter=counter+1
00134                                 #return True
00135                         else:
00136                                 self.non_counter=self.non_counter+1
00137                                 #print 'didnt reach previous goal'
00138                         # unnecessary
00139                         if self.non_counter>5:
00140                                 rospy.signal_shutdown('too many tries')
00141                         self.pub.publish(Twist())
00142                 self.active_goal.set_succeeded()
00143                 #print 'goal has been reached'
00144                 self.has_active_goal=False
00145 
00146         def publishvel(self,traj_points,anyway):
00147                 self.vel.linear.x=traj_points.translation.x-self.lastPosition.translation.x
00148                 self.vel.linear.y=traj_points.translation.y-self.lastPosition.translation.y
00149                 self.vel.linear.z=traj_points.translation.z-self.lastPosition.translation.z
00150                 #print "calculated the cmd vel topic"
00151                 if (anyway or self.vel.linear.x>=0.5 or self.vel.linear.y>=0.5 or self.vel.linear.z>=0.5):
00152                         self.pub.publish(self.vel)
00153                         #print "Published the commands"
00154                         time.sleep(1.0)
00155                         return True
00156                 else:
00157                         return False
00158         def publishrotation(self,traj_points,start):
00159                 self.vel.linear.x=0.0
00160                 self.vel.linear.y=0.0
00161                 self.vel.linear.z=0.0
00162                 self.vel.angular.x=0.0
00163                 self.vel.angular.y=0.0
00164                 if start:
00165                         self.vel.angular.z=0-self.traj_points.rotation.z
00166                 else:
00167                         self.vel.angular.z=self.traj_points.rotation.z
00168                 self.pub.publish(self.vel)
00169                 time.sleep(abs(self.vel.angular.z*3.0))
00170                 self.vel.angular.z=0.0

00176         def compute_goal(self):
00177                 goal=deque()
00178                 #self.robot_state()
00179                 goal.append(self.state)
00180 
00181                 for i in range(1,len(self.traj.points)):
00182                         temp=Pose()
00183                         temp.position.x=goal[i-1].position.x+(self.traj.points[i].transforms[0].translation.x-self.traj.points[i-1].transforms[0].translation.x)
00184                         temp.position.y=goal[i-1].position.y+(self.traj.points[i].transforms[0].translation.y-self.traj.points[i-1].transforms[0].translation.y)
00185                         temp.position.z=goal[i-1].position.z+(self.traj.points[i].transforms[0].translation.z-self.traj.points[i-1].transforms[0].translation.z)
00186                         goal.append(temp)
00187                 #print self.traj.points
00188                 #print goal
00189                 return goal

00192         def checkgoal(self,goal):
00193                 if abs(self.state.position.x-goal.position.x)<1.0 and abs(self.state.position.y-goal.position.y)<1.0 and abs(self.state.position.z-goal.position.z)<1.0:
00194                         return True
00195                 return False
